xdm:name: Out of state shopper with one or more purchases of more than $1000

xdm:condition.xdm:value: homeAddress.stateOrProvince != currentLocation.stateOrProvince AND (some x FROM xEvent WHERE x.eventType.equals("purchase", true) and x.commerce.order.priceTotal > 1000 AND x.commerce.order.currencyCode = "USD")
xdm:condition.xdm:meta: Include audience whose State equals CA AND who ( have at least 1 Purchase event where Total Price is greater than 1000 and Currency equals USD)
